enWisdom: Good is easier [to do] than an evil action

Wisdom: إِنَّ هَذِهِ الطَّبَائِعَ مُتَبَايِنَةٌ وَخَيْرَهَا أَبْعَدُهَا مِنَ الشَّرِّ
enWisdom: Indeed these natural dispositions are different, and the best of them is the furthest of them from evil
Delaying of evil is advantageous to good

Wisdom: شَرٌّ لَا يَدُومُ خَيْرٌ مِنْ خَيْرٍ لَا يَدُومُ
enWisdom: An evil [action] that does not last is better than a good [deed] that does not last

Wisdom: شَرُّ النَّاسِ مَنْ لَا يُرْجَى خَيْرُهُ وَلَا يُؤْمَنُ شَرُّهُ
enWisdom: The worst person is one from whom good is not expected and from whose evil people do not feel secure

Wisdom: لَنْ تَتَحَقَّقَ الْخَيْرَ حَتَّى تَتَبَرَّأَ مِنَ الشَّرِّ
enWisdom: You will never realize good until you renounce evil

Wisdom: مَنْ تَرَكَ الشَّرَّ فُتِحَتْ عَلَيْهِ أَبْوَابُ الْخَيْرِ
enWisdom: Whoever abandons evil, the doors of good are opened for him
One who does no evil to others, [then] expect good from him
One who is cautious of evil is like the one who does good
The key to goodness is renouncing evil

Wisdom: لَا تَعُدَّنَّ شَرّاً مَا أَدْرَكْتَ بِهِ خَيْراً
enWisdom: Never count as evil that through which you realized good

Wisdom: لَا تَعُدَّنَّ خَيْراً مَا أَدْرَكْتَ بِهِ شَرّاً
enWisdom: Never count as good that by which you attain evil

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ أَنْ تَغْتَرَّ بِغَلْطَةِ شِرِّيرٍ بِالْخَيْرِ
enWisdom: Be careful not to be deceived by the good act that the wicked one does by mistake

Wisdom: إِيَّاكَ أَنْ تَسْتَوْحِشَ مِنْ غَلْطَةِ خَيْرٍ بِالشَّرِّ
enWisdom: Be careful not to be repelled by the evil act that the righteous one does by mistake

Wisdom: طَالِبُ الْخَيْرِ بِعَمَلِ الشَّرِّ فَاسِدُ الْعَقْلِ وَالْحِسِّ
enWisdom: The one who seeks goodness through evil action, his mind and senses are corrupt
One who repels evil with good, triumphs?
